TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigErrorGlyph extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 提供 的圖像以在使用者沒有執行設計階段需要的設計工具動作時顯示。

span.span: Provides a glyph for an to display when a user has not performed required designer actions at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 活動設計工具使用 來顯示關聯於設計介面上智慧標籤的動作。Activity designers use to display actions associated with smart tags on the designer surface. 例如，如果活動需要使用者設定屬性，活動設計工具將顯示 以幫助通知使用者需要設定屬性。For example, if an activity requires users to set a property, the activity designer displays to help notify them that they are required to set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫 時，關聯於圖形的設計工具動詞會顯示在活動設計工具介面上。When is called, the designer verbs associated with the glyph are displayed on the activity designer surface.
